alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 12 at 5:23AM CDT until July 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas and northeast Louisiana, including the following counties and parishes, in southeast Arkansas, Ashley and Chicot. In northeast Louisiana, East Carroll, Franklin LA, Madison LA, Morehouse, Richland and West Carroll. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Recent rain has saturated the ground in some areas, and ongoing round of showers and thunderstorms remain capable of producing several inches of rain over a few hours. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
